text: The multi-crew cooperation (MCC) certificate is required for airplane pilots to fly multi-crew aircraft.Du bloc op√©ratoire au cockpit d'un avion de ligne Environnement - Glossaire It is a must for pilots applying for a multi pilot type rating\- Formation travail en Equipage and can be done separately or together.ANNEXE FCL1 CONSOLIDEE == References == Category:Aviation licenses and certifications
title: Multi-crew cooperation
